name: Peep
description:
A puzzle game in which the player must navigate a lost bird through a dangerous forest.  This was made in 2 days for the Global Game Jam but we hoping to use this concept for a larger game. 

WASD/Arrow keys to move.

 Press Space to whistle, luring enemies towards you. This will redirect their path away from the goal point for a little while. 

They will also only move when you move after you whistle. Push rocks by walking into them to block enemy sights. 

Press R to restart level. Be sure not to get caught in the enemies line of sight! This is shown by the tiles outlined in red.
